title: Effective Design and Operational Strategies for Peer Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic curriculum design and understanding of assessment methods
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens with advanced expertise in social fields and prior experience in online learning using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners explain at least three privacy protection measures when designing peer evaluations
Learners compare advantages/disadvantages of feedback formats to select contextually appropriate evaluation methods
Learners develop and implement checklists for peer evaluator training
Learners propose strategies to mitigate difficulties arising from social interaction processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
